widgetsCarousel.title: Freedom of analysis: 48 different ways to look at your assets.

hero.title: The Portfolio Tracker that replaces
hero.description: Take complete control of your investments with DonkyCapital, the most flexible and powerful portfolio tracker on the market. Monitor stocks, ETFs, funds, bonds, and crypto in a single customizable dashboard. Import transactions from CSV, connect broker accounts, and get advanced analytics with interactive charts, performance heatmaps, and detailed P&L. Professional multi-asset portfolio management accessible to everyone.

customizableDashboard.title: 100% Customizable Dashboard
customizableDashboard.description: Drag & drop, save configurations, multiple dashboards: create the perfect view for your investment strategy.

advancedAnalytics.title: Advanced Analytics
advancedAnalytics.description: Multi-period performance, detailed Profit & Loss, visual heatmaps to quickly identify opportunities and risks.

multiPortfolio.title: Multi-Portfolio
multiPortfolio.description: Manage multiple portfolios, import CSV transactions, and get real-time calculations.
multiPortfolio.securityNote: We never ask for access to your broker. Your data stays yours alone.

seoHeadings.h2Features: Monitor exposure, rebalancing, and performance in real-time.
seoHeadings.h3EtfTracker: Advanced ETF Tracker to analyze all your holdings.

partTimeTrader.title: Part-Time Trader

financialAdvisor.title: Financial Advisor

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.earlyProgramDesc: We are selecting the first 100 users for the Early Program. Get free access to all Premium features during the beta phase.

questions.question: Why is Donky Capital the best investment Excel alternative?
questions.answer: It is a smart Portfolio Tracker that eliminates manual data entry, providing real-time ETF/Stock prices and automatic exposure analysis.

questions.question: Do I need to share my broker credentials?
questions.answer: Never. We prioritize privacy: you simply import your data via CSV/PDF files without ever sharing your broker login details.

questions.question: Can I export Scalable Capital data without Prime+?
questions.answer: Yes! With our free Chrome Extension, you can download your transaction CSV even on the Free plan, saving the Prime+ subscription cost.

questions.question: Donky Capital vs Getquin: what are the differences?
questions.answer: Donky Capital offers deeper dashboard customization and superior privacy by avoiding direct broker account linking.

questions.question: What assets can I import?
questions.answer: You can track ETFs, stocks, bonds, crypto, and non-listed funds. It is a comprehensive multi-asset portfolio tracker.

questions.question: Can I use it on mobile?
questions.answer: Yes, Donky Capital is a PWA (Progressive Web App). Install it on your mobile device for seamless tracking without needing an App Store download.

questions.question: What happens to my data?
questions.answer: Your data is stored securely in Europe and encrypted. We prioritize your privacy and never ask for your broker credentials.

cta.title: Ready to take control of your investments?
cta.subtitle: 2-minute setup. No commitment. Cancel anytime.
cta.button: Get Started Free - No Card Required

about.h1Text: We started with a simple problem: managing multiple brokers while trying to get a clear picture of total performance. Like you, we were tired of manual spreadsheets and uncomfortable sharing broker credentials with third-party apps.
about.h2SecurityText: Donky Capital is the secure portfolio tracker you've been looking for. We never ask for your broker login. Simply export your data and import it into our platform to access professional-grade analytics safely.
about.h3DashboardText: Default views don't work for serious investors. We provide a fully customizable environment where you decide how to monitor exposure and rebalance your portfolio according to your personal goals.

descriptions.portfolio-trends: Temporal evolution of portfolio value with stacked area chart.
descriptions.heatmap: Heat map visually comparing performance and weight by category.
descriptions.stack-chart: Displays the percentage composition of the portfolio over time.
descriptions.pie-chart: Pie chart displaying portfolio percentage distribution.
descriptions.allocation-breakdown: Analytical table listing weight, value, and performance for each category.
descriptions.performance-table: Performance over 6 time horizons with trend icons (1D, 1W, 1M, 3M, 6M, 1Y).
descriptions.profit-loss: Complete view of portfolio profits and losses.
descriptions.transactions-list: List of the latest transactions in chronological order.
descriptions.portfolio-table: Complete table listing all portfolios with their key values.
descriptions.holdings-summary: Complete list of currently open positions with ALP and performance.
descriptions.performance-metrics: Synthetic overview of the portfolio with five key indicators.

scalableCapital.title: How to export Scalable Capital transactions and import them into DonkyCapital
scalableCapital.description: Learn how to export Scalable Capital transactions even without PRIME+ and import them into DonkyCapital to analyze assets, allocation, exposure and performance.

scalableCapital.pageTitle: How to export Scalable Capital transactions and import them into DonkyCapital
scalableCapital.pageDescription: Complete guide to exporting transactions from Scalable Capital even without a PRIME+ account and importing them into DonkyCapital, with views on assets, balancing, exposure, and performance.
scalableCapital.intro: If you use Scalable Capital to invest in ETFs, stocks, or mutual funds, you've probably wondered how to track all your operations easily and quickly. In this complete guide, I will explain how to export your transactions from Scalable Capital using the Chrome extension "Scalable Capital Transaction Exporter" and how to import them into DonkyCapital, the portfolio tracker that allows you to manage all your investments in a single dashboard, without using complicated Excel sheets.
scalableCapital.whyExportTitle: Why export data from Scalable Capital
scalableCapital.whyExportText1: Scalable Capital is one of the most used brokers in Europe, thanks to its modern and intuitive platforms. However, many transaction export functions are only available to PRIME+ customers.
scalableCapital.whyExportText2: If you don't want to pay for an additional plan or simply want more control over your data, the Chrome extension Scalable Capital Transaction Exporter is the ideal solution.
whyExportList: Download your transactions in CSV, Excel (XLSX) even without a PRIME+ account;
Keep all data on your device, without sending it to external servers;
Use exported files for personal analysis or import them into DonkyCapital;
Get detailed reports without additional costs.
scalableCapital.whyExportQuote: This means that even those with a free account can finally get all the information on their transactions and have complete control over their portfolio.
scalableCapital.whyDonkyTitle: Why use DonkyCapital instead of the Scalable Capital website
scalableCapital.whyDonkyText1: The Scalable Capital website only shows transaction history and some basic investment information. It doesn't offer a complete portfolio view in terms of:
scalableCapital.whyDonkyText2: With DonkyCapital, however, you can have a complete and personalized dashboard, where you can view your entire wealth at a glance, analyze the progress of your investments, and make more informed decisions.
scalableCapital.whyDonkyQuote: In other words, DonkyCapital allows you to see what Scalable Capital doesn't show you: total control of your portfolio.
step1List: Open Google Chrome on your computer.
Go to the official extension page: Scalable Capital Transaction Exporter on Chrome Web Store.
Click on "Add to Chrome" and confirm the installation.
Once installed, you will see the extension icon near the address bar.
scalableCapital.step1Tip: Tip: Always keep the extension updated to ensure it works correctly with new versions of Scalable Capital.
step2List: Log in to your Scalable Capital account.
Go to the "Transactions" or "Order History" section.
Select the desired time period (e.g., last 12 months).
Click on the Download icon of the Chrome extension.
Choose the file format to export: CSV, Excel, or JSON.
scalableCapital.step2Text: The exported file contains all the main information: transaction date, asset title (ETF, stock, or fund), quantity, price, and type of operation (buy, sell, dividend).
scalableCapital.step2Highlight: Even without a PRIME+ account, you can get all transactions and import them into DonkyCapital for complete portfolio management.
step3List: Log in to DonkyCapital.com and open your account.
Choose the portfolio to import transactions into and select "Import Transactions".
Upload the CSV file exported from Scalable Capital.
Confirm and wait for the file to be processed.
scalableCapital.step3Text: In a few seconds, all your transactions will be visible in the DonkyCapital dashboard, with detailed reports on:
step3ReportList: Comparison between multiple portfolios if you manage several.
scalableCapital.step3Highlight: This level of analysis is not available on the Scalable Capital website, which is limited to historical transactions.
privacyList: The extension does not send data to external servers: everything happens in your browser.
DonkyCapital does not require broker login credentials to import CSV/Excel files.
You can save exported files on your computer or a personal cloud without risks.
tipsList: Export data regularly, for example every month, so DonkyCapital is always up to date.
Keep CSV/Excel files in a dedicated folder on your PC to always have a backup copy.
Always check the data after importing to verify that all transactions are correct.
Take advantage of the fact that even free accounts can get all the necessary information without having to subscribe to a PRIME+ plan.

faq.question: Can I use this procedure with free Scalable Capital accounts?
faq.answer: Yes, even without PRIME+, you can export all transactions and import them into DonkyCapital.

faq.question: Does the extension work on Mac and Windows?
faq.answer: Yes, just use Google Chrome or a Chromium-based browser.

faq.question: Can I import transactions from multiple years?
faq.answer: Yes, by selecting the export period in the extension.

faq.question: Is DonkyCapital safe?
faq.answer: Absolutely: it doesn't require broker credentials and all data is processed on DonkyCapital's secure server.

faq.question: Can I also export dividends and fees?
faq.answer: Yes, the extension exports all transactions visible in Scalable Capital's order history.

scalableCapital.conclusionText: By following this guide, you can finally:
conclusionList: Easily extract transactions from Scalable Capital, even without a PRIME+ account;
Have a complete portfolio view, with advanced analysis of assets, balancing, exposure, and performance;
Manage everything in a single dashboard without Excel sheets or complicated tools.
scalableCapital.conclusionQuote: DonkyCapital transforms your data into useful information, helping you make more conscious and faster investment decisions.

cookieConsent.title: We value your privacy
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.
